desc: The CameraObject3D element is used as the base element for all the 3D cameras. You cannot create a CameraObject3D element directly.

perfectDistance.desc: The distance the camera should be from a material such that one pixel on the material maps to one pixel on the viewport.

far.desc: The distance to the far plane.

near.desc: The distance to the near plane.

fov.desc: The field of view of the camera, in degrees.
